name: #laraveldk
body:
### #laraveldk user group
This is the website of the #laraveldk user group, which at the moment isn't much more than a mailing list.

### Our mailing list
You can (and you should) join our mailing list over at Google Groups. It's called [#laraveldk](http://groups.google.com/group/laraveldk). The purpose of the mailing list is to discuss various Laravel related topics, and also to make announcements about meetups etc. At the moment we are trying to arrange a mini conference / hackathon.

### FAQ
**1. Why are we speaking english**  
Because everyone are welcomed :)

**2. Who can join**  
Everyone, regarding language or location, with an interest in Laravel, can join the mailing list.

**3. How can I help**  
First of all, join the mailing list and participate in the conversation. We need input and ideas for upcoming events.

_(This website is WIP. If you feel like it, you are more than welcome to contribute with anything you would like :))_
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
